airframe.name: dc_mc
airframe.makefile:
ARCHI=avr
main.ARCHDIR=$(ARCHI) main.MCU = atmega8
# to check : 16MHz reso main.LOW_FUSE = 2e main.HIGH_FUSE = cb main.EXT_FUSE = ff main.LOCK_FUSE = ff
main.CFLAGS += -DBOARD_CONFIG=\"conf_dc_mc.h\" main.srcs = main_dc_mc.c
main.CFLAGS += -DPERIODIC_TASK_PERIOD='CPU_TICKS_OF_SEC(10e-2)' main.srcs += sys_time.c $(SRC_ARCH)/sys_time_hw.c
main.CFLAGS += -DUSE_LED #-DTIME_LED=1
main.CFLAGS += -DUSE_UART0 -DUART0_BAUD=B38400 main.srcs += $(SRC_ARCH)/mcu_periph/uart_arch.c
main.CFLAGS += -DDOWNLINK -DDOWNLINK_TRANSPORT=PprzTransport -DDOWNLINK_DEVICE=UART0 main.srcs += subsystems/datalink/downlink.c subsystems/datalink/pprz_transport.c
main.srcs += $(SRC_ARCH)/dc_mc_link.c main.srcs += $(SRC_ARCH)/dc_mc_power.c
